name: Multiplying Array elements
context:
Rearrange the code blocks to multiply each element by 2 of the array called ``table``.
You are not allowed to modify the original array.

Misconception:
  - Variable assignement copies the reference of the objects rather than creating a copy of the object.

choices.success_msg: In order to keep the table unchanged, a duplicate of "table" must be created.
choices.fail_msg: Both variables "table" and "new_table" are assigned to the same table.
